N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 542.4 - Notice of subrogation to liable third parties

State Regulations
(a) If a provider submits a claim for
reimbursement to a liable third party as an agent of the department, such
liable third party is directed to make payment to the provider submitting the
claim. Such provider is authorized to submit with, or notate upon, its claim
the following statement: "This claim is submitted by a medical assistance provider
as an agent of the New York State Department of Social Services in accordance
with 18 NYCRR Part
542
and any payment due to the Department must be made to
the provider submitting this claim."
(b) Instead of submitting the notice
described in subdivision (a) of this section, a provider may submit with its
claim any form supplied or prescribed by the department, a social services
district or a social services official which indicates that the provider is
acting as agent for the department, a social services district or a social
services official. Notes
